cbinstall.description:
Provides the Russian (Russia) language for Community Builder 2.0.10 and its plugins.
For updates and translation projects please visit our Joomlapolis Languages page.

Translation Credits

This translation was accomplished by the efforts of the various Russian (Russia) Joomlapolis Transifex Project teams.

Completion Level

Please consider getting a free account on Transifex and helping improve the quality and completeness of this translation effort.

The following Russian (Russia) projects (name is click-able) and resources were accessed to generate this CB Language plugin:

Project Resource Completeness
Community Builder admin_language.php 100%
language.php 100%
